title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Beauty Therapy
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Beauty Therapy 

Industry) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (beauty therapy industry) order 2024

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

the provision of beauty or spa treatments to persons in a nonmedical setting.
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) provision beauty spa treatment person nonmedical setting

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: In this Order, "beauty or spa treatments" includes make-up, manicure
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order, "beauty or spa treatments" includes make-up, manicure 
treatments, pedicure treatments, waxing and other hair removal treatments, 
eyelash treatments, eyebrow treatments, skincare treatments and massage 
treatments.
text_norm: 3 order beauty spa treatment includes make-up manicure treatment pedicure treatment waxing hair removal treatment eyelash treatment eyebrow treatment skincare treatment massage treatment

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry
text_raw:
4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry 

for which a separate industrial training order is, for the time being, in force. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 23rd February, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [56] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 14 December 2023.

Scileanna was affixed in the presence of: 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf.

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the beauty therapy industry in relation to 
which An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its 
functions in the creation of statutory apprenticeships.
